protocol.text: The data was analyzed using GenespringGX 7.3.1. The raw CEL files were pre-processed using the RMA algorithm and the resulting expression values were normalized per chip to the median across all chips. ID_REF =  VALUE = log2 RMA normalised signal values

Treatment involved enclosing trays of plants under clear plastic covers with a cotton ball treated with Mock (ethanol) or MeJA and attached to the inside of the cover. Each tray and cover was sealed by two layers of opaque plastic bags and secured with masking tape. Samples were harvested after 6 hours.
Plants were grown under short day conditions (8hrs light, 24C and 21C day night cycle) in plastic trays (30 cells 5cmx5cm) with two plants per cell for 4 weeks before treatment.
Total RNA was extracted using the RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen) according to the manfacturer's instructions.
